title: Treasury Yields Rise After Fed Signals Turn to Tighter Monetary Policy
sub_head: Officials also plan to accelerate wind-down of bond purchases as they look to slow inflation
body:
U.S. government bond yields edged higher Wednesday after the Federal Reserve confirmed investorsâ€™ expectations that it was poised to make a sharp turn to tighter monetary policy.
Yields, which rise when bond prices fall, drifted higher earlier in the session, then took another leg upward after the Fed released its latest policy statement and economic projections.
